actions.name: Gulp Missile
actions.description: When the user has an @Affliction[engulfed] creature equipped as a [Stash] item, they can launch the @Affliction[engulfed] creature as part of Gulp Missile. When the @Affliction[engulfed] creature is launched, this Attack's Power doubles, the Attack's Type changes to a Type possessed by the launched creature, and the launched creature takes the damage of the attack, resisted two steps. When launching a @Affliction[engulfed] creature, Gulp Missile has a 20% chance to reduce the target's DEF stage by -1 on hit, a 20% chance to reduce SPDEF stage by -1 on hit, and a 20% chance to inflict @Affliction[paralysis] 5 on hit.
